data.title: Dentists and dental offices
data.meta_description: Sun Life is committed to establishing and maintaining an excellent dental provider network. Learn more and Join our network today!
data.text:
New Provider portal!

The new portal automates previously manual processes and puts everything you need in one place. No more tracking down the right information. You’ll be able to get real-time coverage estimates, eligibility status and more – all with a few clicks. And that is just some of the possibilities.

Learn more about Provider portal resources

Notice regarding Change Healthcare

Sun Life U.S. is operating normally. We are currently receiving and processing dental claims at typical volumes. Our administrative systems have not been affected.

If your dental office previously used the Change Healthcare clearinghouse, here are other methods to submit your claims to us:

Use alternate clearinghouse services: Vyne or DentalxChange

Mail: Sun Life Dental Claims, P.O. Box 2940, Clinton, IA 52733

Fax: 563-242-0184

Questions? Call 800-434-2638

Important information for California members

Free language assistance is available for dental members in the state of California to ensure that residents with limited English language skills are able to access services available to all members.

Members can get an interpreter at no cost to talk to your doctor or health plan. To get an interpreter or to ask about written information in your language, first call your plan’s phone number at 800-443-2995. Someone who speaks your language can help you. If you need more help, call the HMO Help Center at 888-466-2219 (for prepaid dental), or the CA Dept. of Insurance at 800-927-4357 (for PPO dental).

Puede obtener la ayuda de un interpreter sin costo alguno para hablar con su médico o con su plan de salud. Par obtener la ayuda de un interprete o preguntar sobre información escita en español, primero llame al número do teléfono de su plan de salud al 800-443-2995. Alguien qu habla español puede ayudarle. Si nedesita ayuda adicional, llame al Centro de ayuda de HMO al 888-466-2219 (para odontología prepago), o llame al Departmento de Seguros de CA al 800-927-4357 (para odontología PPO).

For additional languages

For information on communications, nondiscrimation, & compliant notices
